FinServ_Revenue__c.name: FinServ_Revenue__c
FinServ_Revenue__c.description: Represents data from Financial Services Cloud and external systems to aggregate revenue streams for an advisorâ€™s book of business.

Account__c.description: Account that Revenue__c is related from. This field or FinancialAccount__c requires an entry but not both.

Date__c.description: Date when this revenue was made.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial Account that Revenue__c is related from. This field or Account__c requires an entry but not both.

SourceSystemId__c.description: A value that uniquely identifies the revenue in an external data source.

SubType__c.description: The subtype of revenues. Valid values: Transaction, Advisory, Investment, Custodian, Planning.

Type__c.description: The type of revenues. Valid values: Fees, Commission.
